My Favourites

Some of the best artworks I have the honor to encounter.

Games

Death Stranding

This is a game like no other… Not only is its “delivery guy simulator”-like play style unique, but it also gives me the feeling of connection with other players, which is usually not the case for single-player or even multi-player games. The amazing soundtrack and breath-taking scenery are the icing on the cake.

Outer Wilds

As a fan of sci-fi, I am in love with this game! At first, the player is just some random astronaut ready to explore the universe. But as we play, we gradually uncover the long history and secrets of a former civilization, learn the great laws of nature, and… Well, I can’t say more. This is a must-play that is best experienced by finishing the game solely by yourself, without looking at other players’ comments or tips.

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt

One of the best open-world games in my mind. It tells a long story, but the path to find Ciri never gets boring. Each character you encounter has so different personalities that this world of witchers, sorcerers, dwarfs and monsters is extremely immersive and realistic. The two DLCs are incredible, some of the best DLCs I have ever tried. Gwent also adds a lot of fun to the game.

God of War

It is awarded Game Of The Year for a reason. It depicts a stunning world based on Norse mythology, and tells a beautiful yet thought-provoking story of a father and a son. The gameplay is amazing, with the seamless combat scenes and cool visual effects, it makes the journey to Jötunheim an unforgettable adventure.

Red Dead Redemption 2

It is the most realistic open-world game I have ever played. The scenery, the physics, the particles, everything is just perfect. The open-world is fine-tuned to the tiniest details that it really let you forget about reality. With the great acting and a beutiful story about redemption, Arthur Morgan is probably one of the most beloved protagonists in all games.

Music

上海彩虹室内合唱团

The Rainbow Chamber Singers have produced some of my faviourite songs. Thanks to Mr. Jin Chengzhi, the songs can tell great stories. 感觉身体被掏空 and 春节自救指南 make the audience laugh easily, while songs like 星河旅馆 and 道别是一件难事 are touching and thought-provoking. The artists have a great passion towards their music, as I can feel by listening to their concerts.

Wiener Philharmoniker

The classic music played by Vienna Philharmonic is one of the best in the world. I have been recently addicted to the Neujahrskonzert for each year, where cheerful musics are beautifully played, giving people all over the world new hope for a better new year and a brighter future.

Prosit Neujahr!

Low Roar

Though I learned about this band through the game Death Stranding, I quickly became one of their fans. Their music have amazing power. Being calming and soothing, they make me feel relaxed on my way to school or back home after a day of busy works. Some of my favourites are Once In A Long, Long While, I’ll Keep Coming, Gosia, and Don’t Be so Serious.

Rest in peace, Ryan Karazija. I will always remember and appreciate your music.
